thread.title: Birner Dental Management Services, Inc. Schedules Earnings Call To Discuss Fourth Quarter And Year Ended 2017 Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Birner Dental Management Services, Inc. Schedules Earnings Call To Discuss Fourth Quarter And Year Ended 2017 Results
text:
DENVER, March 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Birner Dental Management Services, Inc. (OTCQX: BDMS), business services provider of PERFECT TEETH ™ dental practices, will conduct a conference call to review fourth quarter and year ended 2017 results. In addition to fourth quarter and year ended 2017 results, the teleconference may include discussion of management's expectations of future financial and operating results. The call will be held on Monday, April 2, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. MT.
Dial in to 1-888-312-9863 refer to Confirmation Code 5742256 approximately five minutes prior to the scheduled time. Please put this on your calendar and plan on joining us for this call. If you are unable to join us on April 2, 2018, the rebroadcast number is 1- 888-203-1112 with Passcode 5742256 which will be available through April 16, 2018.
Birner Dental Management Services, Inc. acquires, develops, and manages geographically dense dental practice networks in select markets in Colorado, New Mexico, and Arizona. The Company currently manages 68 dental offices, which operate under the PERFECT TEETH™ name.
Certain of the matters that may be discussed in the conference call may contain forward-looking statements that are subject to certain risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from expectations. These and other risks are set forth in the reports filed by the Company with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
Contact:
Birner Dental Management Services, Inc.
Dennis Genty
Chief Financial Officer
303-691-0680
